description: This file contains a Python script that defines a movie recommendation agent using the 'agno' framework. It sets up an agent with specific tools, models, and instructions for generating personalized movie suggestions based on user prompts. The script includes example prompts demonstrating various types of movie queries.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an intelligent agent that interacts with users and external tools to generate responses.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and stream a response based on a user prompt.
